Hello!

I'm Danny Pham, an enthusiastic and pragmatic software engineer focused on building and shipping products with external impact.

Get in touch dpham760@gmail.com

Background

I am currently a Software Development Engineer at Amazon scaling distributed systems for Ring with an amazing group of individuals. My work involves building low latency systems operating at hundreds and in some cases thousands of TPS. I deal with anything and everything that relates to the configuration of your Ring devices.

I am an alumnus of the University of California, Irvine. Throughout college, I was able to successfully complete internships at Flexport, NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory, Amazon, Siemens, and Spetcial.

As a software engineer, I have become a firm believer in working with integrity and responsibility as well as having a passion and drive to exceed expectations. I pride myself on getting things done and shipping products with external impact. Given any project, I'm excited to roll up my sleeves, cut through the noise, and make it reality. I strive to be affable and endeavour to be forever self-improving.
